Given the fact that no convention is widely adopted for the naming of these files yet,
I decided to keep a list of what each file is meant to be, to improve the usability
of this directory a little bit.

001.xml  -> Non-grade items exchange, just for education
002.xml  -> Teleporter scrolls
003.xml  -> Newbie exchange
009.xml  -> Proof of Catching a Fish

101.xml  -> Tickets for pet collars Exchange
102.xml  -> Noblesse Gate Pass for items
382.xml  -> Quest 382: Head Blacksmith Vergara
426.xml  -> Quest 426: Fishing Shots
500.xml  -> Seven Signs - Purchase consumable items

1001.xml -> Dual Swords up to C-grade
1002.xml -> Unseal B-grade gloves or boots
1003.xml -> Reseal B-grade gloves or boots
1004.xml -> Blacksmith crafting service
1005.xml -> Blacksmith Special Abilities bestowing service

3361.xml -> Quest 336: Coins of Magic, Rewards level 1
3362.xml -> Quest 336: Coins of Magic, Rewards level 2
3363.xml -> Quest 336: Coins of Magic, Rewards level 3

6281.xml -> Swamp of Screams: Abercrombie, first list
6282.xml -> Swamp of Screams: Abercrombie, second list

7097.xml -> Prestigious Items Hall: Galladucci (weapons)
7098.xml -> Prestigious Items Hall: Alexandria (armors)

7834.xml -> Quest 343: Under The Shadow Of The Ivory Tower, exchange Orbs
7897.xml -> Quest 351: BlackSwan, exchange Bills

8522.xml -> Quest 632: Necromancers Request

83880001.xml -> Quest 633: In The Forgotten Village - Exchange Livers

76781001.xml -> Dual swords: Helton, require dualsword craft stamp
78461001.xml -> Dual swords: Wilbert, doesn't require dualsword craft stamp

80610001.xml -> Manor Products: Gludio
80610002.xml -> Manor Products: Dion
80610003.xml -> Manor Products: Giran
80610004.xml -> Manor Products: Oren
80610005.xml -> Manor Products: Aden
80610006.xml -> Manor Products: Innadril
80610007.xml -> Manor Products: Goddard

80922001.xml -> Seven Signs - Black Marketeer of Mammon - SA Removal for AA
81132501.xml -> Seven Signs - Merchant of Mammon - Buy Etc Items
81262501.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - SA: S-Grade
81262502.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - A-grade duals
81262503.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Duals S-Grade.
81262504.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Unseal S-Grade Armor.
81262505.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Unseal S-grade Accesories
81262506.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Unseal A-Grade Armor
81262507.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Unseal A-grade Accesories
81262508.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Reseal A-grade Armor
81262509.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - SA removal
81262510.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - SA: A-grade
81262511.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Weapon Upgrade
81262512.xml -> Seven Signs - Blacksmith of Mammon - Weapon Exchange
